name: Thing of the Deep
flavorText: A terrifying being spawned from the primordial depths. To gaze upon it is enough to drive one mad. Currently disguised as a frog.
flavorTextHtml: A terrifying being spawned from the primordial depths. To gaze upon it is enough to drive one mad. Currently disguised as a frog.

primary.textHtml: Critical Hit Chance Increased by [8.0 - 10.0]%

secondary.textHtml: Increases Gold and Health Pickup by 20 yards. (Witch Doctor Only) 20
